entry.title: Special thanks to you all from all around the world
entry.summary: We are thankful to all of you from all around the world , who help us to make our vision possible. Your support to sdm Apps is really great and you all give us your valuable time and love to make our apps famous. In year…
entry.content:
We are thankful to all of you from all around the world , who help us to make our vision possible. Your support to sdm Apps is really great and you all give us your valuable time and love to make our apps famous.

In year 2016 sdm Apps is registered as Google Play Developer under the Google Play Developer rules. sdm Apps is registered as individual developer that develop apps that are publish on Google Play Store.

When sdm Apps is in beginning it start with just 1 downloads on Google Play Store , But today the apps that developed by sdm Apps are in the palm of more than 25000+ users all around the world.

The first app of sdm Apps is Steed Browser and it's launch for more than 120 counties and it used by more than 10000+ users around the world.

Today sdm Apps have 8 Apps available on Google Play Store to download for users around the world.

entry.title: Test News: Is news fake? (Detect fake news)
entry.summary: Test News is the world’s simplest app for testing and detecting fake news. It is designed to spot the fake news that you received on your phone or by any other social networking sites. Why use Test News? • Fake news is today’s most common…
entry.content:
Test News is the world’s simplest app for testing and detecting fake news. It is designed to spot the fake news that you received on your phone or by any other social networking sites.


Why use Test News?

• Fake news is today’s most common problem over mobile network and on social networking sites. We must solve it by taking care of news that we read and share.

• With the help of Test News app you can test any news and can detect fake news.

• So let’s make some change today in the world with Test News. Use Test News today and also help others to spot fake news and to stop spreading fake news over internet.

How to use Test News? 

• It is the simplest app ever for testing and detecting fake news, just copy news and tap on notification to test any news. 

• You can do same with test button, just copy news and press Test button to test any news. 

• You can also write news manually, just write news and press Test button to test any news. 


Thank You for reading and giving your time.

Get Test News from Google Play Store :

 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sdm.apps.testnews

entry.summary: We All Surf Web Everyday , But Sometimes We Can Not Find The Data From Any One Search Engine That's We Need . So What to do ? Search It App Is Developed to Make Web Surfing More Simple and More Fast , With Search…
entry.content:
We All Surf Web Everyday , But Sometimes We Can Not Find The Data From Any One Search Engine That's We Need . So What to do ? 

Search It App Is Developed to Make Web Surfing More Simple and More Fast , With Search It App Now You Can Search On Many Sites , With Just Single Word.

You Just Need To Type Any Word In Search Box And Than Press The Given Site Icon , On Which You Wants To Search Data.

You Can Search Data With Following Sites In Search It :

- Google
- Bing
- Yahoo
- Aol
- Excite
- Duckduckgo
- Github

entry.title: NewText: Text Reinvented for Friends
entry.summary: It's Real Take A Lot's of Time to Develop Pattern from Text for 'Good Morning' , 'Thank You' and 'I am Happy'. NewText Is As Simple As It's Name. You Just Need To Type Any Text In Text Box And Than Press The Pattern Icon…
entry.content:
It's Real Take A Lot's of Time to Develop Pattern from Text for 'Good Morning' , 'Thank You' and 'I am Happy'.

NewText Is As Simple As It's Name. You Just Need To Type Any Text In Text Box And Than Press The Pattern Icon or Emoji, On Which You Wants Reinvent Text.

You Can Create Pattern and Reinvent Text For Any Text , Like 'Your Name' , 'Your Friend Name' , 'Good Morning' and Anything Else That You and Your Friends Love to See and Share.

You Can Reinvent Text With Following Patterns In NewText :

- #######

- %%%%%%%

- ooooooo

- ~~~~~~~

- &&&&&&&

- ()()()()()()()

- +++++++

- =======

- ||||||||||||||

- {}{}{}{}{}{}{}

- [][][][][][][]

- <<<<<<<

- >>>>>>>

- )()()()()()()(

- }{}{}{}{}{}{}{

- ][][][][][][][

And Also Patterns With Emojis:

- 😀😀😀😀😀

- 😊😊😊😊😊

- 😍😍😍😍😍

- 💀💀💀💀💀

- 👻👻👻👻👻

- 💋💋💋💋💋

- 🍬🍬🍬🍬🍬

- 🐵🐵🐵🐵🐵

- 💥💥💥💥💥

- 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

- 🎈🎈🎈🎈🎈

- 💓💓💓💓💓

- 💔💔💔💔💔

- 🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂

- 🎁🎁🎁🎁🎁

Now Reinvent Text In Simple Way and Share With Your Friends.

entry.content:
Simple Net is application which help you to connect with OpenDNS’s DNS nameservers. Simple Net use FamilyShield nameservers from OpenDNS. So it make internet safer, faster, and smarter for your whole family.

The motto of this app is to give simple way to connect with OpenDNS and make your family safe online with just one click and also no root is required.

Try it today and make your whole family safe online.

entry.title: Tintap: The game of tints and shades. (Game 2018)
entry.summary: I like it because this game is good for enhancing your brain.No comments it's perfectSuper GameNice appGoodAnd there are also lot's of reviews given by you all. We are thanks to you all from all around the world for make Tintap famous. Get Tintap from Google…
entry.content:
Tintap is the game about the difference between the colors that’s look like same. As we all know the human eye can distinguish about 10 million different colors. So know what about you. Ever you imagine the possibility with colors that your eye can see?

This game is design with this simple concept in mind that human eye can see the colors differently , in this game you just need to select on color from given four different color , this color must be same as the color of drop that fall from top.

If the selected color is same as the color of drop then you will get the point else the game will be over. So don’t try just play, but try to learn something new and you will get the knowledge about our eye can see the different between colors.

Think different, play different & see different.

So if you try you will learn, if you don’t you will not see the possibility!

entry.title: The Billion App : Use Billion Apps In One Phone
entry.summary: Yes! You read the right. With the help of The Billion App, now you can use billion apps in one phone. The Billion App is a FREE productivity app available for Android smart phone and tablet. The Billion App uses websites as app. Instead of…
entry.content:
Yes! You read the right. With the help of The Billion App, now you can use billion apps in one phone.

The Billion App is a FREE productivity app available for Android smart phone and tablet. The Billion App uses websites as app. Instead of installing the entire big size of app , it just add the URL of website which can be use as app. Switch from installing apps to The Billion App to use billion apps in one phone , to share web apps instantly, to manage websites in categories, Generate QR Code for website , Scan QR Code and lots of more. 

Instead of installing entire app The Billion App will store only the URL of the apps website and redirect you to that website with just one click. As Example If we have URL stored in Database with size of 1 Byte, and then we can store and use 1000000000 Apps in your phone with 1GB storage. Thus with the help of The Billion App we can use 1000x (Thousand times more) apps in the phone. 

WHY USE THE BILLION APP: 

• NO APP INSTALLATION: The Billion App uses URL of website directly, so you don’t’ need to install entire app. Like for Facebook App it use www.facebook.com , same as for Twitter App it uses www.twitter.com and it works in same way for all other apps. 

• WEB APPS: You can use web apps for photos, videos, documents, and other apps.

• FREE UP SAPCE: Now your phone never need to uninstall apps due to phone storage, The Billion App required no space to store any app, it just use URL of the app , so you can use 1000x more apps. 

• BOOST YOUR PHONE: Now your phone no need to hang, The Billion App required no more ram or memory to use any web app, it just use little memory and boost your phone. 

• APP CATEGORIES: Enjoy websites as app in very well formed categories, so you can manage your website in smarter way.

• INSTANT SHARING: You can share any web app with any other The Billion App user within second, you just need to scan one QR Code. 

• IMPORT WEBSITES: If you don’t know any URL of web app , then you can import lots of websites for each category with just one click on IMPORT SAMPLE WEBSITES.

• SECURITY CODE: If you want to protect your app from unauthorized access then you can give security code to app, it will also help you to give privacy to your app data. 

• ALWAYS ON THE GO: Just open any app with one click and use app instantly without any delay for app installation.

• QUICKLY ADD NEW APP: You can add any website and use as app. You can do this quickly with just one click. 

• OFFLINE SUGGESTION: Even if you don’t know URL of any website, then offline suggestion will help you to suggest website URLs without internet.

• FREE WEBSITE SUBMISSION: if you want to boost you website traffic than you can submit your website to The Billion App for free.

• AND MUCH MORE: You can also do many more things like generating QR Codes , Automatic Icon Finding , Searching within App , Change Themes , Customize app as your need. And much more..

*Data charges may apply while using Internet to access web apps. 

What you all said about The Billion App :

Do billion use of this app really great
Very useful especially for phones with low specifications.
Awsome app for multi-tasking app working
Best app good concept I like it
It's very nice.. keep it up..😊
This is very helpful and Great app
Supper job....
Super app .i like it very much . Very nice

And there are also lot's of reviews given by you all. We are thanks to you all from all around the world for make The Billion App famous.

Get The Billion App from Google Play Store :

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sdm.apps.thebillionapp

entry.title: Gati Browser 2018 : Secure, Private, with Privacy
entry.summary: It’s really amazing to explore new ideas , new vision , learn something new and experience it, but what about your privacy when you surf over internet ? Sometime we see that some ads shown on any webpage is one of our interest, or about…
entry.content:
It’s really amazing to explore new ideas , new vision , learn something new and experience it, but what about your privacy when you surf over internet ? 

Sometime we see that some ads shown on any webpage is one of our interest, or about what we surf at last time. This all is happen because of some tracking sites that track you online, what you surf for, what you clicked and also many things.

One of the solution is we use any search engine or search provider that does not track you , but what about your favorite search engine or search provider , so how we can stop trackers from being tracked while surfing our internet ?

That’s why the Gati Browser is comes on the market. Gati Browser is web browser same as other browser, but it provides the incredible functionalities to stop trackers, make browsing without history and cleaning all data on exit. It also has strict content blocker which blocks contents which unsecure or contains ads.

Gati Browser is designed to be making web browsing simpler, with more security and with lots of privacy without leaving your favorite search engine or search provider.

Key features of Gati Browser:

- Simple , Fastest and Secure.
- Small app size.
- Manage new tab and all tab automatically.
- No history.
- No trackers.
- No ads.
- Always send DNT (Do Not Track).
- No suggestion.
- Powerful content blocker.
- Powerful navigation.
- No direct file access.
- No location access.
- Multiple search provider.
- Desktop view.
- Full screen.
- Block image.
- Dim light.
- Popup blocker.
- Support 22 languages.
- Support any external download manager.
- All data clear on exit.

Gati Browser gives privacy in following way:

- It never store your history.
- Store no data, all data cleared on exit.
- Always send DNT (Do Not Track) request.
- Block tracking ads.
- Block invisible trackers.
- Blocking with content blocker.
- Never try to direct download anything from web.
- Require No Dangerous permissions that can give the app access to the user's confidential data.
- Require Only Normal permissions like, Access Internet. 

Gati Browser provides security in following way:

- Show SSL Error.
- Block reflected XSS.
- Block location spoofing.
- Block JSON hijacking.
- Block XSS in CSS.
- Block cross-origin CSS attacks.
- Content Security Policy.
- Cross Origin Resource Sharing.
- Block visited link sniffing.

Gati Browser support following languages: 

- Arabic
- Bangla
- Chinese (Simplified)
- English
- German
- Gujarati
- Hindi
- Italian
- Japanese
- Javanese
- Korean
- Marathi
- Portuguese (Portugal)
- Punjabi
- Punjabi
- Russian
- Spanish
- Tamil
- Telugu
- Turkish
- Urdu
- Vietnamese

If you really need simple browser with the best security, privacy and ads blocking than Gati Browser is top browser for you.

Let’s make web not look at you with Gati Browser today.

Support Gati Browser with just click on Love It from the Menu in Gati Browser.

Thank You.

entry.title: Steed Browser: That can make the life incredible.
entry.summary: Yes! You read the right. Steed Browser can make your life incredible. Steed Browser is designed for the people who really want to make something incredible in their life. As we all know to create something great, to learn something great we need the most…
entry.content:
Yes! You read the right. Steed Browser can make your life incredible. Steed Browser is designed for the people who really want to make something incredible in their life. As we all know to create something great, to learn something great we need the most powerful tool for it, and the one of the most powerful tool in this step is web browser. But really all web browsers are useful?


Steed Browser is designed with its core value to create something better, to give something better. It have concept of simplicity in its core design. It is designed for all who wants to start their life as to create something incredible in this universe. Steed Browser can do task that really useful in everyday. And help you to build the new experience of new era of technology.

With Steed Browser you can do...

- Web Surfing for all around your day.
- Offline Surfing, when you left connection.
- Get the collection of web for your life on your main screen.
- You can change the experience of sharing.
- You can take print of your document or just create its PDF.
- You can generate QR code of any website and can scan it.
- You can do everything that important to you.

Why Steed Browser?

Because of its simplicity, that can help you to make your day better, for getting new experience of web sharing, for see the web differently than others.

Why Steed Browse required permission?

Steed Browser work with the device, to perform some device level task Steed Browser required some permissions, you can understand its use as below...

ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: To check for network is available or not.

ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: To check WIFI connection is connected or not.

INTERNET: To connect and use Internet.

ACCESS_DOWNLOAD_MANAGER: To download files with Download Manager.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: To store and retrieve downloaded files.

WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: To store and retrieve downloaded files.

CAMERA: To scans QR code with the help of camera.


Steed Browser is not just only the web browser but it also the tool to make your life more simple and to create the incredible piece of universe.

Thank You.
